description: Just like the beautiful centre of Sansepolcro in which it is situated, this restaurant has much to boast about, with a history dating back over 200 years. The beautifully decorated dining rooms on the first floor of the palazzo are a picture of elegance, while the service is friendly and more informal. Traditional cuisine from inland Tuscany, plus welcoming guestrooms which add to its appeal.
